snippet: A last-second jumper by Klay Thompson and hot 3-point shooting lifted Golden State, which handed Indiana just its fourth home loss of the season.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Golden State Warriors beat Indiana Pacers, 98-96; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: A last-second jumper by Klay Thompson and hot 3-point shooting lifted Golden State, which handed Indiana just its fourth home loss of the season.

headline.main: Warriors Hand Pacers Rare Home Loss
headline.print_headline: Warriors Hand Pacers Rare Home Loss
